results.title: Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin during the resolution phase of experimentally formed venous thrombi.
results.text_hl: After 48 hours, the @SPECIES_9986 @@@rabbits@@@ were treated with saline, @CHEMICAL_Heparin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006493 @@@heparin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, or @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ combined with @CHEMICAL_Heparin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D006493 @@@heparin@@@, respectively, for 14 days.

citations.NLM: Feng Y, Lei B, Zhang F, Niu L, Zhang H, Zhang M. Anti-inflammatory effects of simvastatin during the resolution phase of experimentally formed venous thrombi. J Investig Med. 2017 Aug;65(6):999-1007. PMID: 28442532
